entries.text: Thank you for calling VeloFit customer support. Your call may be recorded for quality assurance. Please state the reason for your call.
Yeah, hi. I need to return something. I bought a VeloBand Pulse a little while ago, and it's just not working out for me. I want my money back.
Okay, I understand. To start, could you please provide your order number or the email address associated with your VeloFit account?
It's [customer email address]. Look, I don't have a lot of time, so can we just get this done? This VeloBand Pulse is garbage.

Thank you. I've located your order. I see you purchased the VeloBand Pulse on the 1st of July. Today is the 16th of July. I'd be happy to look into this for you. Could you please describe the issues you're experiencing?
It's not accurate! The heart rate readings are all over the place, and the sleep tracking is completely off. It's useless! I want a refund.

I understand your frustration. I've reviewed our return policy, and the VeloBand Pulse, like all our fitness trackers, is eligible for a full refund within 10 days of purchase. Unfortunately, it appears your purchase was made 15 days ago. Therefore, a full refund isn't possible at this time. I apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
What?! That's ridiculous! I didn't see anything about a 10-day return window. This is completely unfair. I need this money back!

I understand your disappointment. While a full refund isn't possible due to the return window, I can offer you store credit for the full purchase amount. This store credit can be used towards any other VeloFit product on our website. How does that sound?
Store credit? Ugh. I guess that's better than nothing. But I really needed the cash. Is there absolutely nothing else you can do? Maybe a policy exception?

I wish I could make a policy exception in this case, however, the 10-day return window applies to all VeloBand Pulse products and fitness trackers. But store credit will give you the opportunity to try another one of our great products. Perhaps another fitness tracker, or a new pair of running shoes?
Okay, fine. Store credit. What do I need to do?

Great! I've already processed the store credit for the amount you paid for the VeloBand Pulse. You should receive an email within the next hour with your unique store credit code. This code can be applied at checkout on our website.
Okay. I see the email. Thanks... I guess.
You're welcome! Is there anything else I can assist you with today?
No, I think that's it. Thanks for your help.
You're very welcome! Thank you for choosing VeloFit. Have a great day!
